mapper.select: SELECT mark.id,seek.id AS ids,miss_name,seek_type,seek_status,gender,birthdate,miss_date,miss_detail_place,GROUP_CONCAT(seek_img.url SEPARATOR ',') AS seekimgs,mark_time FROM mark LEFT JOIN seek ON seek.id=mark.seek_id LEFT JOIN seek_img ON seek.id=seek_img.seek_id WHERE mark.customer_id=#{customerId} GROUP BY mark.id,seek.id,miss_name,gender,birthdate,miss_date,miss_detail_place,mark_time ORDER BY mark_time desc LIMIT ${(currentPageNo-1)*pageSize},${pageSize}
SELECT id FROM mark WHERE customer_id=#{customerId} and seek_id=#{seekId};
mapper.delete: delete from mark where customer_id=#{customerId} and seek_id=#{seekId};
